anathema: Allow weaker evils to survive due to the presence of larger evils, deceive others outside of tactical gain
edict: Seek and destroy evil, study evil to learn the best way to destroy it, train others in righteous ways
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Angradd (The Forge-Fire)](/Deities.aspx?ID=444)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 304

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Seek and destroy evil, study evil to learn the best way to destroy it, train others in righteous ways

**Anathema** Allow weaker evils to survive due to the presence of larger evils, deceive others outside of tactical gain

**Area of Concern**
Fire, offensive war, tradition

**Pantheons**
[Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=376)

**Domains** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Breathe Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457)

- **2nd**
[Blistering Invective](/Spells.aspx?ID=1970)

- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530)

</column>
name: Angradd (The Forge-Fire)
